sources.title: Guns, Girls, And Gangsters (1958)
sources.description: Mamie van Doren, Gerald Mohr, Lee van Cleef

metadata.Plot: Chuck Wheeler gets out of the penitentiary and sets up an elaborate heist of Vegas casino money travelling by armored truck. He enlists the help of shady club owner Joe Darren and his ex-cellmate's wife, Vi. Vi's husband Mike is a trigger happy and jealous hothead and will not grant her a divorce. Mike escapes from prison right before the armored truck job goes into motion and promises trouble as he tries to locate his associates and his wandering wife.
metadata.Writer: Robert E. Kent, Paul Gangelin, Jerry Sackheim
metadata.Actors: Mamie Van Doren, Gerald Mohr, Lee Van Cleef
